be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.controllers.collaborator

Class InvitationProjectController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.controllers.collaborator.InvitationProjectController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InvitationProjectViewController.Listener

    public class InvitationProjectController
extends java.lang.Object
implements InvitationProjectViewController.Listener
    InvitationProjectController handles the window with all the invitations project with the current user if he has unread notifications for a collaboration with the inviter(s).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      InvitationProjectController(javafx.stage.Stage stage, Application application)

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addProjectsInvitations(java.util.List<Project> projectList, User newCollaborator)
      Adds the projects invitations into the view.
      void confirmButton(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> listOfProjectIds)
      Once the confirm button is pressed, the below method will launch and it will check which project has been accepted to collaborate by the current user and then handles all the database (from ProjectCollaborationDatabase) changes.
      void initView()
      Initializes the InvitationProject view.
      void showAndWait()
      Shows the stage and wait for button confirmation.

      • confirmButton

        public void confirmButton(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> listOfProjectIds)
        Description copied from interface: InvitationProjectViewController.Listener
        Once the confirm button is pressed, the below method will launch and it will check which project has been accepted to collaborate by the current user and then handles all the database (from ProjectCollaborationDatabase) changes.
        Specified by:
        confirmButton in interface InvitationProjectViewController.Listener
        Parameters:
        listOfProjectIds - the list of ProjectID's
